artworks.title: A Sunday on La Grande Jatte
artworks.alt_text: Large painting of people in a crowded park, brushstrokes are dots.

artworks.title: Nighthawks
artworks.alt_text: Scene in a diner, viewed through wrap-around glass windows, at night on an empty urban street. A light-skinned man and woman, he in a suit and she in a red dress, sit together at a triangular wood bar, eyes downcast. At left sits another man, his back to the viewer. Behind the counter is a light-skinned man in a white uniform. The interior lights cast a yellow glow that spills onto the street in pale green. Above the diner a sign reads, "Phillies".

artworks.title: Sky above Clouds IV
artworks.alt_text: A work made of oil on canvas.

artworks.title: American Gothic
artworks.alt_text: Painting of a woman and an older white man holding a pitchfork, both seen from the waist up. They stand side by side with stern expressions, in front of a white house with a peaked roof.

artworks.title: The Bedroom
artworks.alt_text: Painting of bedroom, blue walls, green window, tan bed, red bedding.
